reviewText: Only watched because it was one of Cory Monteith's last movies.

The story does a good job of showing what anxiety and depression can do to people.  Not only the person suffering but the friends and family around them.  It was great to see Cory Monteith in another role (besides Finn Hudson on Glee), he would have been a great actor.
cory Monteith had so much potential, he was great.
Super fast delivery, didn't ask for 2 day delivery, but both movies came in just 2 days excited to watch Cory monteiths last two movies ever filmed

Was looking foward to seeing this love cory montieth Moved so slow could have been written better  I had to turn it off could
Not even finish watching it

I truly enjoyed this show... a good old fashioned movie where you feel as though you build a relationship with the characters.  It was nice to see Cory Monteith in something other than Glee.  Karine Vanasse did a great job portraying a woman with post traumatic stress disorder.  I did feel that the story line behind the post traumatic stress disorder could have better explained the history behind it.  She was unable to make physical contact with anyone, but that seemed distant from witnessing her sisters death without knowing more about the death.  Cory played a great businessman disengaged from his wife.  Kevin Zegers was a great addition with his own issues and understanding of Karine's.  Movies with Canadian actors seem to have something that US actors no longer have and I greatly enjoyed this show.
It was an excellent viewing experience
Started to watch but I fell asleep. The movie seems to drag and I just watched it for cory Monteith
I enjoyed it.  Amazing how personal trauma can affect people differently, and the ways in which they might overcome the damage.
I loved this show, and Karine Vanesse was fantastic!

its just a so so movie. very predictable given the characters and their current marital status. if you don't mind sitting through a predictable situation and waiting for it to develop, then its an ok way to spend an hour and a half. but, personally, i wouldnt want to do it again. there are better movies to spend your time on. I did think the lead female actress did a good job, but thats about all
It's a quiet and different movie, but that's the kind I like. Interesting to see Cory in a different role like that. I'm becoming a big fan of Kevin Zegers too.
